definition: to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Split the meat from bones, cut it and put in a tray.
sentences.chinese: 接着把肉从骨头上拆下来，切一下在放入一个盘子中。

sentences.english: Remove chain drive wheel from crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 从曲轴上拆下链条驱动轮。

sentences.english: Detach a link from a chain.
sentences.chinese: 从链子上拆下一个链环。

sentences.english: If equipped, remove the radio antenna mast, and components from the fender .
sentences.chinese: 如果装备了无线电天线罩和零件，从挡泥板拆下它们。

sentences.english: Disconnect the secondary spark plug cable from the ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 从点火线圈上拆下辅助火星塞电缆。

sentences.english: The shaft sleeve and mechanical seal can be replaced without removing the shaft from the pump.
sentences.chinese: 轴套和机封的更换不必将轴从泵上拆下来。

sentences.english: We need a carpenter to detach this bookshelf from the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一名木匠将书架从墙上拆下来。

sentences.english: Remove switch for reversing light from the transmission.
sentences.chinese: 从变速器上拆下倒车灯开关。

sentences.english: Just be careful and don�t throw away the old ones.
sentences.chinese: 只是要小心，而且先不要丢掉拆下的旧电池。

sentences.english: Loosen oil pan bolts and remove the front bolt at each side.
sentences.chinese: 松动油底壳螺栓，拆下每一面的前螺栓。
从齿条活塞上拆下工具。

sentences.english: So, the first stage of the experiment is to recover all these pins and connectors.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们的第一步就是拆下所有的针脚和连接器。

sentences.english: Somebody picked off the door in order to determine the shed material.
sentences.chinese: 有人曾经将屋门拆下，来确定小屋的材质。

sentences.english: Dismantle the front panel of the chiller.

definition: bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
bolt (for locking a window, cabinet etc)/(electrical) plug
